Name: Africa Hunting
About the game: 88 year, in Africa there was a crisis and riots broke out. All these events force the usual African guy Abig to become a pirate - to destroy planes and rob them to earn money for survival. Play for Abig and destroy planes, catch humanitarian cargo, and dodge of rockets. Features: -Ability to be an African pirate -Different types of planes (3 types of planes) -Good soundtrack -Simple and fun gameplay -Steam achievements About planes: 1 type of planes- transport, they need to be knocked down and for each destroyed plane the player gets +1 to points. 2 type of planes- cargo, they do not need to be knocked down, for each destroyed plane the player gets -5 to points. A cargo plane sometimes drops a humanitarian cargo, for the assembly of which the player gets +1 to points 3 type of planes- combat (military), they need to be brought down, for each destroyed plane the player gets +1 to points. Also this kind can shoot rockets, you need to shy away from them, so as not to die
